sentence.Network_en: The person who embodies democracy at the local level is the mayor.
sentence.Network_cn: 在地方上代表民主的人是市长。

sentence.Network_en: She took revenge on her ex-boyfriend by smashing up his home.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了报复，她砸了前任男友的家。

sentence.Network_en: They should make up with their ex-enemy in the West.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们应该和西方的老对头和解。
